name: SWORDEMONIUM
description:
This is the story of a human, who, after being exiled, succumbed to the deep voices within the darkness... NOTES:
  • This is a game made in a week for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 so it may need some polishing. (I had no time to  test the game)
  • he Interaction System its a bit clunky. Sometimes, you´ll have to click more than once to make it work.
  • The ending its bugged, so i´ll fix it when the voting period ends.
CONTROLS:
